document.full_text: goldman sachs group inc chief executive lloyd blankfein was in good spirits on friday at his firm's annual meeting, despite battling some testy shareholders and what seemed to be a cold.
document.title: goldman sachs ceo lloyd blankfein is cordial but sniffly
lines_and_colors: goldman sachs group inc chief executive lloyd blankfein was in good spirits on friday at his firm's annual meeting, despite battling some testy shareholders and what seemed to be a cold.
